name: Donald J. Trump
currentRole: Chairman and President of The Trump Organization
description: Donald J. Trump is an American businessman, television personality, and politician who served as the 45th President of the United States. He is the founder and leader of The Trump Organization, a real estate development company.
vision: To develop the most luxurious properties in the world and maintain the gold standard in real estate development.
recentDevelopments: Expansion of global real estate portfolio
